summary: Email chain from July 7, 2019, regarding attorney Martin Weinberg's difficulty accessing his client Jeffrey Epstein at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) following Epstein's arrest. The correspondence involves efforts to verify Weinberg's bar status to facilitate a pre-presentment meeting.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on July 6, 2019, and detained at MCC.
Epstein's attorney, Martin Weinberg, was denied access to meet with him at MCC on July 7, 2019, because Weinberg is barred in Massachusetts (out-of-state).
Weinberg had represented Epstein in the past and was representing him in the current case.
Efforts were made to verify Weinberg's bar status to facilitate a meeting before Epstein's court presentment scheduled for July 8, 2019.
The correspondence highlights concerns about Epstein's access to legal counsel following his arrest.
